meta.title: - Agora Cyber Charter SchoolAgora Cyber Charter School

meta.name: description
meta.content: Discover how Agora, a PA public cyber school, can deliver a personalized learning experience facilitated by certified teachers and in the comfort of your home!

Agora Cyber Charter School is committed to providing our families with information related to COVID-19 through various means of communication. In addition to the email messages sent to your Agora account, please refer to the following links for additional information: Agora Cyber Charter School Continuity of Education Plan What are Agora’s plans for PSSA … Continue reading ""

li.class: is-home menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-home menu-item-681

div.blockquote:
“I came to Agora at the age of 19 because I had dropped out of school at 16 due to medical issues. Agora taught me that nothing is impossible to achieve. I love this school and am proud to be graduating. “
- Caitlin, Agora graduate, Class of 2014

main.p: Agora Cyber Charter School is committed to providing our families with information related to COVID-19 through various means of communication. In addition to the email messages sent to your Agora account, please refer to the following links for additional information:

p.a: Agora Cyber Charter School Continuity of Education Plan

main.h3: What are Agora’s plans for PSSA and Keystone exams?
main.p: The Pennsylvania Department of Education (PDE) announced on 3/19/2020 the cancellation of all PSSA testing and Keystone exams for the 2019-20 school year as a result of COVID-19. This includes the Pennsylvania Alternate System of Assessment (PASA). (more from Secretary Rivera’s message)
main.h3: Where can I get the most up to date information?

ul.li: PA Department of Education: COVID-19 Response Efforts March 15, 2020 – 12 p.m.

main.h3: How can I talk with my children about COVID-19?

a.span: Coronavirus: How to Talk to Your Child
How to Talk to Your Child about Coronavirus Disease 2019

ul.li: National Public Radio: Just For Kids: A Comic Exploring The New Coronavirus

main.h3: How can we help children cope with the stress surrounding the outbreak?

li.span: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention:

a.span: Helping Children Cope with Stress During the 2019-nCoV Outbreak

ul.li: PA statewide toll-free support line for those struggling with anxiety due to coronavirus: 1-855-284-2494. For TTY, dial 724-631-5600. It will be staffed around the clock.

li.a: Resource list to support parents’ efforts to maintain a positive home learning climate

main.h3: What can we do to help prevent the spread of COVID-19?

li.span: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention:

ul.li: CDC guidance on how to properly wash hands: Handwashing: Clean Hands Save Lives
Healthy Children.org: Handwashing: A Powerful Antidote to Illness

li.a: What you need to know about coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)

ul.li: COVID-19 Update – Asynchronous Days March 16 and 17 3/15/2020
PSSA and Keystone Exams Cancelled for 19-20 School Year 3/27/2020
